channel.title: How to find a Action Button Id? Doesn't show [PI]
channel.description:
Ok, I'm trying to find the action Id's for some options in an interface I'm using, but when I click the options, it doesn't say anything in the server thing.
I can't find it in any Action Button Id lists, so Idk what to do.
If it matters, the interface id is 2459, and the text Id's of the options are 2461 and 2462.
Thanks in advance.

item.title: How to find a Action Button Id? Doesn't show [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Fringe_Division1 Fringe Division
item.description:
@Fringe_Division1 wrote:

check your server cmd it should tell you the actionbutton when you do it.

Read full topic
item.source: How to find a Action Button Id? Doesn't show [PI]
